message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth more than that to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I am only willing to pay up to $10000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I appreciate your offer, I'm not able to go that low.  How about we split the difference at $10500? It's still a good price for you, and allows me to make a fair profit.
